page.name: Odium's Bane
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Blade of Odium's Bane I
page.description: Gifted to Valentidus by Love herself to use against the spiteful Odium, this weapon of love now finds its way into your grasp. Many have tried, but none have forged its match in craftsmanship!

page.name: Feathers of Odium's Bane I
page.description: Granted to Valentidus by Love himself during his battle with Odium. Perfect for holding back the forces of hatred and evil!

page.name: Battlehelm of Odium's Bane I
page.description: Granted to Valentidus by Love themselves after his battle with Odium. Use this shining helm in defense of all that is love and good!
